headline: Salesforce (CRM): Assessing Valuation Following Steady Revenue and Earnings Growth
summary: Salesforce (CRM) shares recently moved higher as investors digested the company's steady revenue and net income growth over the past year. While the gains this week have been modest, the underlying fundamentals continue to draw attention. See our latest analysis for Salesforce. Even after a robust period of net income and revenue growth, Salesforce’s share price has struggled this year, dropping more than 31% year-to-date. However, with a three-year total shareholder return nearing 50%, the...

headline: How CEPI’s Digital Transformation Project Win Will Impact Cognizant Technology Solutions (CTSH) Investors
summary: On November 20, 2025, the Coalition for Epidemic Preparedness Innovations (CEPI) selected Cognizant Technology Solutions to lead a multi-year digital transformation project, including the implementation of a new core HR and Expense Management System and enhancement of CEPI’s Salesforce platform. This win underscores Cognizant’s recognized expertise in digital transformation and AI-enabled enterprise architecture across the healthcare and non-profit sectors. We'll look at how this significant...

headline: Why The Narrative Around Salesforce Is Shifting Amid AI Progress and Cloud Uncertainty
summary: Salesforce’s consensus analyst price target has been revised lower, with fair value estimates slipping from $334.68 to $330.59 per share. This adjustment reflects a blend of optimism about the company’s AI initiatives and product growth, as well as more cautious sentiment driven by subdued core cloud demand and fierce competition. Stay tuned to discover how investors can keep pace with these evolving Wall Street narratives moving forward. Stay updated as the Fair Value for Salesforce shifts...

headline: Elon Musk Says Starship Can Deliver 300 GW Solar AI Satellites Per Year, But There's One Major 'Piece Of The Puzzle' That Stands In Its Way
summary: SpaceX CEO Elon Musk has claimed that the Starship rocket can deliver 300 Gigawatt solar-powered AI satellites to orbit amid space-based data center talks. Tonnage To Orbit Solved By Starship, Says Elon Musk Salesforce Inc. (NYSE:CRM) CEO Marc Benioff took to the social media platform X on Wednesday, sharing a video of Musk talking about the cost-effectiveness of having datacenters in Orbit vs on the ground.
